*div1 type="summary"* *p*Peter Ellis Bean to Austin, March 18, 1829. Assuring Austin that reports of Spanish invasion unfounded. Opinion of law to protect debtors.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacagdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-18-1829">March the 18ths 1829*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sor Corl Dn Esteban F, Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*My Dr Sir I have Recivd a letter from you with out Dait Stating that *person_mentioned*Corl Pedras */person_mentioned*had Sent you and ofiseal Stating that thare was an Expodision fiting out in the *location_mentioned*Habana */location_mentioned*for this *location_mentioned*Cuntrey */location_mentioned*thare was a rumor en *location_mentioned*Neworlans*/location_mentioned* that en the *location_mentioned*Habana */location_mentioned*they was aPresing Vesels to Carry men to Some *location_mentioned*Port*/location_mentioned*, But in a few Days after all Was Contradicted and aserted that it was fals and By what I Can larn if the *person_mentioned*Spanish troops*/person_mentioned* leaves *location_mentioned*Havana */location_mentioned*thare will with out [doubt] be a Revilusion in that Piase and I expect that in *location_mentioned*Spain */location_mentioned*they are now in the same as the *person_mentioned*french troop*/person_mentioned* had orders to march from *location_mentioned*Spain */location_mentioned*and at that moment it was Begun in Some Parts of *location_mentioned*Spain*/location_mentioned*, But the Reason that *person_mentioned*Col. Pedras*/person_mentioned* Rote this ofisial Was that a *person_mentioned*Mexican */person_mentioned*Rote By me and Before he ast me aney thing about it he Startid and Extreordenero Express as he Done onse Before When he Said that the *person_mentioned*Royalists */person_mentioned*was in *location_mentioned*tranity Bay*/location_mentioned* But you will See that all is Nothing I am hapy to hear that your Peopel is all united in Defens of the *location_mentioned*Cuntrey */location_mentioned*Whare thir Intrust lies I gave you thanks for the Copey of the Law that Delebrate [delivers?] the *person_mentioned*Settlers of this *location_mentioned*Cuntrey */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*from Paying Debts Before Contracted untill 12 years after the Date it will give Roome for men to make Property and not be Broke up as it has bin the wish of Some to Buy in the *location_mentioned*united Staits*/location_mentioned* at and under value those Debts for spacilasion But I am hapy that thare is astop to all,*/p*
*p*as for *location_mentioned*News Papers*/location_mentioned* I have at the moment None But I will Send you Some as you Direct me as Soon as Posibel— I Should of answerd your letter last Mail But it Never Came to hand untill the Mail was Goan*/p*
*p*I hop you will Pass the time well and Command Your friend*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*P. Ellis Bean */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
